topic.title: Please tell me whether you are able to see the uploaded video guys... trying to clone kopyKate

1_1cVZvPSZJpUptxyCqWePm4JKhxM77NNV4.body: By sharing you are letting them access the file you are sharing and also if they pin it now they will start serving your content and network effect.. So even if you are not hosting the file it is available and shared by someone.. QmYwAPJzv5CZsnA625s3Xf2nemtYgPpHdWEz79ojWnPbdG

5_16t83GyRixTRFbTL91Lvk2q3Z8kJzJfAXH.body:
trying to clone but doesn't seems to be working.. 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/13kudhnjpkQTSK6tEokMmvphgCZ1cZjxv3/

2_15jbvtNJw2ih3m5L38mUcdJxtvmW6Uh2K6.body: Thanks Guys let me see.. Something stopping from showing the videos uploaded. at my end it shows fine..

> [kopyjanecollege](#comment_1_1H2stvnD8p5DZHVZBikfX7ErTgKnw53D7c): Forums: English · Dansk · Español · Français · Deutsch · Magyar · Italiano · Polski · Português · Québec · Русский · Українська · 中文论坛


@Kopyjane.. You are the master.. Just wanted this for my site.. :) Thats why was trying.. I will use both your site and mine to upload the video that way we get more seeders ..  I would like to work with you on this.. Anything that I can do.. How can I reach you..

> [naeui7tycw9p35y9](#comment_10_1CaVUegZMXMjmRXtq5q3eZDqdtsoNvgep): are you sure about this? as i can remember there were seeders only per site. that means your and copykatesss would not share seeders. anybody have hard facts on this one?

I uploaded a video to kopykate big and uploaded the same video to mine it was showing the seeders same as Kopykate site may be I am wrong.

> [kopyjanecollege](#comment_1_1H2stvnD8p5DZHVZBikfX7ErTgKnw53D7c): I will release a clonable version of the site by Christmas.. on GitHub. It'll have all the full features by then.. as well as documentation. Patience, guys.. lol

Hi Jane.. One issue I am seeing is the names are not getting displayed in full and it would be nice if we can upload the thumbnail.
